a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Gross domestic product (GDP) by world region
This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
Data source: Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database 2023

Note: This data is expressed in
international-$
at 2011 prices.
